TENDER NOTICE
# Tender Reference: cb-237-45771854

**Title:** Barricade Warning Tape
**Tender Closing Date:** May 20, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

## Classification and Notice Information
* **UNSPSC Classification:** Traffic control
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply of Barricade Warning Tape in accordance with RCMP Purchase Description PD-PE-15 dated 2024-01-15.

The Standing Offer will be valid for a period of two (2) years from the date of issuance, with the option to extend for three (3) additional one (1)-year periods.

## Phases
The procurement will proceed in two phases: Phase 1, an Expression of Interest, and Phase 2, the Request for Standing Offer.

**Phase 1: Expression of Interest**

To participate in this requirement, interested parties must complete and sign the attached Submission of Interest form and Non-Disclosure and Confidentiality of Information Agreement (NDCIA) and send them via email to the Contracting Authority.

**Phase 2: Request for Standing Offer**

All interested parties with a duly completed and signed Submission of Interest and NDCIA form will receive a copy of the Request for Standing Offer, specifications, and any other associated documentation in Phase 2.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The RCMP will evaluate proposals based on the lowest price. The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Important Information

* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is available to identify Indigenous business capacity. A profile in the IBD can increase your company’s visibility and provide additional business opportunities.
* Enquiries regarding this proposal must be submitted via email to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the NPP closing date.
* The RCMP retains the right to modify, change, or terminate the phases of the Procurement at any time during the Procurement period.
